weekly picks (Aug 2 week 2023)

Posted on August 7, 2023 in 2023aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Aug 2nd week collection

  1. short-spectacular-life-viral-room-temperature-superconductivity-claim The short, spectacular life of that viral room-temperature superconductivity claim (LK99, Science)

  2. science.ade9995 Programming twist angle and strain profiles in 2D materials (Science)

  3. PhysRevX.13.031017 Observation of Magnon Bound States in the Long-Range, Anisotropic Heisenberg Model (magnon, PRX)

  4. PhysRevLett.131.060405 Shortest Route to Non-Abelian Topological Order on a Quantum Processor (Vishwanath, PRL)

  5. PhysRevLett.131.066301 Intrinsic Nonlinear Hall Effect and Gate-Switchable Berry Curvature Sliding in Twisted Bilayer Graphene (PRL)
